lines.text: Oh, you hate your job? Oh my god, well why didn't you say so? You know there's a support group for that. It's called EVERYBODY. They meet at the bar!
Is that the most terrible sound you've ever heard?
Have you ever tried to start your car with a cat sleeping on the intake manifold?
No.
Then yes, that's the worst sound you ever heard.
[Drew awakes from his coma]
How long was I out for?
A long time, Drew. It's 2137. I'm the great-grandson of Lewis Kiniski, the first human emperor. Unfortunately, you are my slave.
Kate, how long was I really out for?
Silence, slave!
Carey, are you familiar with the TV show 'Survivor'?
Yeah.

Good. Today we're going to play the office version of 'Survivor'. Every employee is going to vote for someone who they want to be fired. Whoever gets the most votes, gets fired! Oh, but you can't vote for me, I'm English. I've already been kicked off an island.
I always get screwed by the system. That's my place in the universe. I'm the system's bitch.
I think I should help people.
That's good. My uncle was a general at the Salvation Army, until he went crazy and led a surprise attack on the Good Will Store. There was blood and platform shoes everywhere...
[Drew and his scouts are singing a "special" song]
Who's that in the office, stinking up the place? Mimi! Mimi! Your butt looks like your face!
[Drew realizes that he's the only one singing]
What the hell are you?
A good scout never insults people.
Yeah, but that's thing, Timmy.
[gestures towards Mimi]
That's not people.
You know, kids, Drew's head is just like a piñata. If you hit his head enough times when he's sleeping, candy comes out.
[the kids gasp]
Well, first blood, then candy. Keep hitting.
I am sick of hearing about poor Drew. "Oh, my house is too big, I have too many wives! I just clogged up my toilet 'cause I crapped a solid gold brick!"
[a replica of Cleveland made from Legos blocks his path]
My hero, Gandhi, would find a non-violent solution. My other hero, Godzilla, would do this.
[crashes through Legos]
[Lewis's mother just told Drew that Lewis has an I.Q. of 162]
I'm going to have to tell him. Maybe now, he'll know why he has so much trouble connecting with people. I just hope he takes it well.
[cut to an outside shot of Drew's house]
BOW DOWN BEFORE MY GIANT BRAIN.
[laughs hysterically]
[Mimi kicked Steve out]
So, where are you staying?
A hotel.
You shouldn't be staying in no hotel, you should be staying here.
Thanks, but if I stay here, Mimi's never gonna let you see your nephew.
Why don't you stay with me and Lewis?
Really?
Sure. You clean, you cook, you're like a big, bald Mary Poppins.
[Steve and Mimi moved their trailer into Drew's backyard]
I couldn't sleep last night. The rocking trailer kept me up.
Oh, sorry.
And, then, the screaming started.
What was that?
That was me, when I realized what was going on in the trailer!
[Upon seeing Drew's look-alike]
So much crap they had to start a second pile.
[Drew's in a coma]
Is he going to live?
Well, he could just wake up, or he'll need a shock to his system.
A shock...
[turns to Mimi]
Honey, this is your department.
Man, it must be weird thinking you're going to lunch with someone and you end up going to their funeral.

Yeah. The closest things I've ever had to that is when my pet possum died. One minute he was fine, the next, on his back, dead. So I buried him in the backyard. But the weird thing is, the next morning, the grave was empty, and the ghost had taken a dump in my shoe.
Oswald, how do I look?
On the Oswald Harvey scale... I'd give you a six.
Oswald!
Don't worry Kate, it only goes up to six.
Oh.
It starts at three.
[Drew and Oswald accidentally spray Lewis with a liquid that attracts eagles, and run inside]
Open the door! Open the door, for god's sake!
[the eagle doesn't show up]
What, I'm not good enough for ya?
If the eagle didn't show, then what does it attract?
[Lewis is suddenly attacked by a pack of squirrels]
Help! Help! Let me in!
You know, I'd run for cover, if I were you.
Because eagles eat squirrels.
Well, you can huff... and you can puff... and... oh my god! I'm making a pig joke out of myself!
If frogs could fly... well we'd still be in this mess, but wouldn't it be neat?
Ah, spring. When a young man's fancy turns my stomach.
When was the last time you saw a young man's fancy?
When was the last time you saw *your* fancy?
I cracked Mr. Wick's secret password. It's "Mr. Wick".
He might as well just use the word "password".
I am a toilet of sadness. Oh well, at least I'm not a dying whore.
How do I look?
Not just sexy, grandpa sexy.

[to Mimi]
Hey, Stella. Get your groove back.
An Englishman. Well, it's almost like a woman.
This beer kicked my ass!
Write down a number you think is fair... and shove it up your ass!
Look, this is an odd question, but you're kind of cute and you're pretty nice to me. Are you drunk? It's OK if you are.
I don't say this often but grrrrrrr.
You're late.
I had a hard time getting out of bed this morning.
Remember, lift with the knees.
You know, I had such a great time with my band last night that even seeing you couldn't affect it. OK, that's not true.
Your lips say goodbye, but your ass says, still here!
I have a position of indirect respect and oblique power.
[On sex]
One person's always disappointed. So far, I've been lucky; it's always been the woman.
If you hurt my sister they will never find any piece of you! Not even your glasses! Remember, I am a janitor, I know how to dispose of things!
Is that a threat?
You want me to sing it to ya?
Violence doesn't solve anything? World War I. World War II. Star Wars. Every Super Bowl. Who says violence doesn't solve anything?
Man... what do you get a guy who's just lost the girl of his dreams and is having a gay green-card wedding just to get his crappy job back?
Champagne flutes?
You read my mind.

[looking at Mimi's vagina as she's about to give birth]
It's like a portal into another dimension!
"Drew Fairy". Last week, it was "Screw Carey".
Looks like every week it's Screw Carey.
Mimi, if you lose the bet, you'll have to name your baby after us. Lewis Oswald.
No, no. Oswald Lewis.

[after much careful thought]
Loswald!

[to Kate]
You're just jealous because you don't have an electric wheelchair.
All right, all right, I admit it. I killed him. But by the time they catch me, I'll be in Mexico... . I mean Canada.
I have obsessive compulsive disorder. I have to do everything in threes. That's kinda how I got my reputation in school as a slut.
Good Lord, Carey! I believe you just stumbled upon the recipe for "Suck"!
[Disucssing Vegitarianism and Animal Rights]
Come On Drew, haven't you ever been passionate about anything in your life?
Yes, my hatred of the XFL!
What's wrong, Mimi? I think you look pale, but I can't tell.
What are you doing here?
Well, I'm not freezing my penis! That's for sure!
Hmmm... I never get the answer I think I'm going to get.
[On Drew's learning that his ex-girlfriend was getting married]
Drew, look into my eyes and tell me you don't feel like crying.
There's not a man alive who could pass that test, Mimi.
[discussing Drew's cyber date]
Yeah, is pathetisad a word?
Hey, whatever BeerStud3 and HoneyBee23 do is their own business.
Beer stud? Forget pathetisad, is weirdork a word?
How bout sarcastibitch.
You can lie to me, you can lie in court. If you want, you can even lie in front of my car, but you will never beat this machine.
Drew, we found the Bed and Breakfast where the lesbians are staying!
Yeah, we rented the room next door and the walls are paper thin!
I want to be a scoutmaster.
[pause]
Tomorrow.
'Hey, drink it off, buddy.'
Bite me, pig!
the sound three mirrors make when you look at them.
Oh, my God! How could you lie on the Bible.
Well, it's simple. I'm a single, 41 year-old janitor. What's God gonna do? Take *that* away from me?
[about Mimi]
What makes her so mean?
Deep down inside of her, there's a scared little girl... and she's giving her indigestion.
You don't take no for an answer, do you?
Hey, it's my style. If you can't dazzle, wear 'em down.
This prank brought to you by Mimi Bobek. Bobek - humiliating pigs since 1995.
Wow! Another steaming pile of good news!
MR. WICK! Drew's too fat to do his job!
[a depressed Drew thinks he's been fired, and sings "High Hopes"]

[sobbing and singing]
I've got high hopes, I've got... high hopes. I've got... high apple pie-in-the...
[sniffs]
... sky hopes...
[to on-looking workers]
EVERYBODY!... Every time you're feeling low, here's the way to go... just remember that ant... Oops, there goes ten years of my life!
Well Drew, This may just be the medication talking, but women are like street cars, they're big and they have bells that go "clang clang clang clang clang!"
[after Drew grabs one of Mimi's trolls]
Hey! Don't touch the troll!
Is that what your mother told your dates?
[Wick's mother tied Drew up and is about to have sex with him]
I have to help my Nigel any way I can. I can change your mind about this job. I've changed many mens' minds.
Was one of them Elton John?
It's a great day. Drew's got a new job, Kate got a promotion, and the manager at Drug-Co is paying me off so I won't talk about their new experiment.
Really?
Yeah, I'm supposed to meet him in the woods at midnight.
How much is he going to pay you?
I don't know, but I think it's going to be a lot. He told me to bring a duffel bag I could fit in.
I only use my sick days for hang-overs and soap opera weddings.
[about her baseball playing]
I protect home plate, like a Mormon girl on prom night.
If Mormon girls looked like you, they wouldn't need protection.
Bro, I wanted to tell you something for a long time... I play for the other team.
I knew it, he's gay.
No, I mean the other softball team. And, if you think I'm gay, well... talk to the hand.
[sticks out his hand]

[to Steve's hand]
Oh, hello.
[Lewis ate a human liver that Oswald brought home for his med class]
I'm a freak! I need some time alone!
[Opens the door, at the same time that Milan comes in. Lewis makes sucking noises, creeping her out and leaves]
I hope he's going to be all right.
[Oswald stands up, bangs his leg on the table, and limps outside]
Well, I'm off to the morgue to get another human liver.
Hi, Drew... I see why you drink...
Oswald? Oswald Harvey?
That's what it says on my underwear.
Hi, you probably don't remember me. I used to sit next to you, in homeroom class.
Oh, yeah... How could I not remember you. By the way, you remember that girl that had the same first name is you. What was her name?
I don't believe this. You're taking advice from Oswald? Oswald who once swallowed a sponge to soak up all the beer, so he won't get drunk?
Did I get drunk?
We had to take you to the hospital! You were clinically dead for two minutes!
But, did I get drunk?
Hey, what were you doing upstairs?
I was using your blow dryer to defrost my crotch.
Well, you just bought yourself a blow dryer mister!
I have a question to ask. Am I healthy?
Well, you sound healthy. I can hear you breathing from here.
I have an idea. Well at least hear me out first!
Uhh, Oswald nobody objected.
Oh, OK. Anyway, if you're afraid to take a physical, you could get Lewis to take it for you.
[pause]
Why are you looking at me approvingly?
Because I'm proud of you. We can now add the word "savant" to your title.
Did it ever occur to you, that every time you look at Saturn, there may be another sad and lonely guy looking at you through a telescope?
Did it ever occur to you, that you're the only one here who has to wear sunscreen on his head?
[Everyone thinks Drew is crazy]
He's here! Get down!
[Everyone ducks]
Look, I don't want everybody being afraid...
[Everyone starts getting up]
Did I say get up?
[Drew is arrested for trying to kill Mimi]
Is it true, Mr. Carey that you harbor violent feelings for Mrs. Bobek?
That's ridiculous.
If it's that ridiculous, why did 20 coworkers hear you say
[reads statement]
"I'm going to kill you"?
That's just a figure of speech!

[continues reading from statement]
"That's not a figure of speech. You are dead!"
No, you're reading it all wrong.
[happily]
I'm gonna kill ya! That's not a figure of speech, yoooouuu'rrrrre dead!
[pause]
I want a lawyer.
Look, dad, this isn't easy for us.
Can't you, at least, make an effort?

Now, you listen to me. While most guys were pushing pencils, I was torching commies out of caves in Korea. I've worked at a job I hated for 40 years. I've raised two boys. I'm tired, damn it! I just want to lay there and get mine!
So, Mr. Wick, you're off to see your girlfriend.
Yes, I got all I need. Flowers and 100$.
Ok...
Oh, yes. You see, she's always in need of money the poor thing. But I don't let that bother me. She's very nice, and shy. The girl won't even let me kiss her.
Mr. Wick, is she a prostitute?
Oh, no! She's an actress who's researching the part of a prostitute, going on... 14 years now.
Oh, and does she have a very strict acting coach who beats her with an iron pipe every once in a while?
[Drew and Mimi signed a truce, forbidding them to play pranks on each other]
Oops. Clumsy me. I just dropped a pen. I'm just gonna have to bend over and pick it up. Thus, leaving my butt open to a kick, stabbing, or the possible application of a humorous bumper sticker.
[bends over]
I'm warning you, Mimi. You're waving a steak in front of a hungry dog... God, I want to hurt that butt!
It wants to be hurt!

[to Oswald]
What are we watching here?
[Lewis and Oswald are acting dumb, in front of Drew's webcam]
Look, the only two boobs nobody wants to see on the internet.
[Clemens brings a horse into Drew's backyard]
Hey, Clemens, I got a riddle for you. What has four legs and shouldn't be in my backyard?
Oswald and Lewis.
Ok, what has the I.Q. of...
[looks at Oswald and Lewis]
What smells like...
[looks at Oswald and Lewis]
What craps standing...
[looks at Oswald and Lewis]
Get that damn horse out of my backyard!
Don't worry Kate, I don't mind that you're dating Drew. As long as he doesn't see that tape.
Oh, my god! You still have that tape?
Yeah, the one we made at the karaoke bar.
Oh, I thought you meant THAT tape...
Ohh, that tape. No... I accidentally sold that at a yard sale.
Ok, Drew. You need some practice. Pretend I'm Kate.
[takes out a picture of Kate, with the mouth cut off]
Give it to me, big boy!
[starts making motions with his tongue]
Uhh, Lewis? Why do you have a picture of Kate with her mouth cut out?
Oh, don't worry. It's nothing weird. I have one of all of you.
[to his stomach]
Why are you doing this to me? Look at you! No salads, no sit ups! You're the envy of your friends!
I don't get it, how does a guy look at his girlfriend without doubling over?
I can't do that. I'm already the single guy living in his parents' house. I can't be seen digging a grave in the middle of the night.
Who would have thought that if you combine Steve and Mimi's genitals, something this beautiful could come out.
If we win, you have to name your son after us.
And, if I win, you two have to legally change your names to 'Boob 1' and 'Boob 2'
That's ridiculous.
Dibs on 'Boob 1'!
Damn!

[about Mimi]
I can't take it anymore. She's either in my home, or at my work. I watch "Unsolved Mysteries". People disappear all the time. Why can't she?
Drew, you can't wear that suit, it was made in a factory that practices child labor. Underage children should not be forced to work like that.
Of course not! Look at the crappy job they do! What I wouldn't give for two minutes alone with the brat that sewed this together...
Ok, Drew is really going to mope about this. So, we need beer, junk food, and pity sex.
I'll get the food.
I'll get the beer.
[pause]
Every damn time!
[Drew and Kate are about to have sex for the first time]
I'm a little nervous.
Me, too. In fact, I'm so nervous, I over freshened a little. I hope you really, really, really like spring rain.

[laughs]
Well, this is it.
Yeah. Think about it, this is the definitive moment of our relationship.
What do you mean?
Well, everything has been going so well, that the only thing that could ruin it is bad sex.
[pause]
Well, goodbye erection!
I have a fertility problem. The doctor told me to take fertility pills.
How many more do you have to take, before you become a woman?
If I wasn't feeling so lady-like right now, I'd bitch slap you all the way to the coffee machine.
Look at this- champagne, scented candles, Barry White CD's. Either you and O'Brien are going to do it, or it's gotten to the point where you have to get your hand in the mood.
It's called romance. Not all of us can make our asses glow red to attract a mate.
You're going to have sex for the first time, with the woman you loved all of your life. I won't try to put any pressure on you. Not at all. Instead, I'd like to congratulate you... prematurely.
All right. Drew told us not to let speedy into the house.
Where is he?
Probably in the brewery.

[opens the door]
Ok, when he comes out, we pretend to let him into the house, and then we catch him.
[Speedy comes out of the brewery, with a six-pack]
Hey, he brought us a six pack! But, why did he put it all the way over there?
'Cause he's a dumb animal. Come on, let's go get it.
[Oswald and Lewis go to get the beer, while Speedy runs into the house, and pushes the door closed, locking Oswald and Lewis out]
We must never speak of this again...
Wow, Lewis. That was fast. How did you learn to tie ties like that?

Oh, at Drug-Co we like to make the monkeys believe that we're going to turn them into people, before killing them. When they go into that room, all dressed up, there's nothing but a fat guy with a hammer...
[Mimi is wearing a Medieval dress]
Well, well, well. If it isn't queen Isafella.

[hangs up phone]
Well, Wendy and I are having lunch tomorrow.
That's fine. I'd like to see Wendy again.
Well, actually... she just wants to have lunch me.

[to Lewis]
This subject will never change. I bet you 100$, this subject will never change.
Why are you guys wearing suits?
Well, Wendy's coming back. Looks like ripe picking for the love buzzards!
Picking at the bones of her self respect!
I don't know how to break this to you guys, but, I don't think she was ever crazy about you two.
Ahh, but you don't know how forgettable we are. I went out on a date with this one woman. She told me about her worst date ever. Little did she know- that date was me.

[flirting]
I'm Oswald. And, as of last week, I am work-free.
You're not still attached to Lisa, are you?
No, I'm not attached to my Lisa at all.
[Oswald and Lewis are having a double date]
Hey, Oswald. Hey, Lewis.
Oswald? Lewis? Now, I remember! You two were the door-to-door underwear inspectors!
[girls get up and leave]
That was 10 years ago, baby! We're senators, now!
So, what do you want me to do? Put my legs in the air and shut up?
Is that a trick question?
Look, Drew, we brought the same minister that married me and your father.
Uhh... Yeah, but... Kate and I can only be married by a Catholic priest!
That's right! That way... our son could never grow up to be pope! See? I can't tell my parents that my son could never be pope! That's just crazy!
Oh, Kate... You and your Catholic Voodoo...
Drew Allison Carey, what have you done?
Allison? All three of his names are girl names!
Steve! If you don't come out of this bathroom, I'm burning this house down!
She'll do it, too! You saw what she did to her face!
[Pregnant women are attracted to Drew]
Oh, I get it. You only want the bad boys to plant the seed. But, come the harvest, all the ladies want reliable old farmer Drew.

[puts Drew's hand on her stomach]
Feel that? It's a boy!

[puts her hand on his stomach]
Feel that? I'm a boy, too!
I don't know about you guys, but I could sure use more beer.
All right.
One case, coming right up.
Why do you need a whole case?
I don't know. Why do you have to shed light on my addiction?
I think Santa doesn't want to kill us anymore. We didn't get any death threats, recently. And, when we threw Kate to him and left her for dead he didn't touch her.
Yeah, he told me not to worry and that he wasn't going to rape me. He told me that after what Santa saw in the Gulf War he could never be with a woman again.
Wendy, this thing here is Mimi.
Hello.
Hi! I'm Mimi! If you ever need a friend, or want to talk... Well, too damn bad!
[Wendy leaves]
Mimi, she's new in town, she's short on money, she doesn't have any friends. I guess what I'm trying to say is... Thanks for taking it easy on her.
Your brother turned me inside out last night.
How can you tell?
Ok, if we do this, we do this right. Nicki, you're 'Cobra'.
Cool, we get nicknames. What's mine?
How about 'Girl who's only nice to me when she needs something'?
Nah, too long.
How about 'Tramp'?

[to Drew]
You're like some kind of superhero that can ward off success at every turn.
My dad always said- "The day I can't do my job drunk is the day I turn in my badge and gun".
[In a bar]
First one to hurl is a girl.
I can't believe Oswald has a son.
I know. I feel bad for the kid. You grow up thinking your dad's Neil Armstrong. Instead, you get Forrest Gump.
Hey, Mimi, I found something that'll help you get pregnant.

[to Steve]
A blindfold for your penis?
What do you got there, Carey?
Uhh, nothing, sir.
Is that the new report?
Uhh, yeah that's what it is.
Well, let me see.
No! Uhh... I mean, it's not finished.
Let me see what's in your hand, Carey.
Ok... uhh... It's uhh... a present for Kate. Yeah, it's erotic pictures of me. I'm in a thong.
I got a feeling you're covering... But I can't take that chance.
[Drew's baseball team sucks]

[to Kate, who's relaxing on a lawn chair]
Kate, what the hell are you doing? You're supposed to be standing at first base!
If somebody on this team actually gets to first base, I'll stand there naked.
Hey, Lewis, I got a question. Did you ever sleep with a close friends' girlfriend?
Oh, I see where this is going... I'm in. But, Kate, when we're in bed Drew's and my eyes must never meet.
Lewis, let me make this clear. The only way I'd lie next to you naked is if we're in a mass grave.
We have to tell Oswald the truth eventually. I mean, we can't just keep distracting him with shiny objects... Ok, we can, but we got to stop doing that.
How does a guy keep from doubling over every time he looks at his girlfriend?
[Drew, Oswald, and Lewis all look at Steve]
That is just rude!
Oh, my god. I realized why I screwed up my life. I always wanted attention. I'm a pity whore!
Aww, Drew...
No! Do not pity the whore!
[after losing a bet, Steve has to eat dog food]
I think I'm going to be sick.
You put your tongue in Mimi's mouth and this is what makes you sick?
[In a bar, Mr. Wick gives the check to Mimi]
A lady never pays!
A lady doesn't shave her armpits in the car, on the way over.
It's a boy! We're having a boy!
[Drew comes in]
Actually, I'm glad it's not a girl. After all, what woman could live up to this beauty?
All women, most men and some horses. Good morning.
[Mr. Wick needs a green card marriage]
I can't get married! All women I know hate me!
Don't forget the fellas.
[gets up to leave]
Wait a second. I did forget the fellas. All I have to do is marry a man!
You can't marry a man.
Yes, I can! There's a state where it's legal, now!
[gets down on one knee]
Drew, will you marry me in Vermont, the state that makes New Hampshire nervous?
[Oswald just found out he has a son]
His name is Robert Gates! I wish it was Bill though...
How come?
Well, imagine all the fun you could have. 'Hey, Bill Gates, take out the trash! Hey, Bill Gates, mow the lawn! What're ya, Bill Gates, an idiot?'
[Drew and Mr. Wick are about to get married in Vermont]
Penny for your thoughts?
I wish I would have died on the toilet last night.
Penny for your thoughts?
I wish you would've died on the toilet last night.
I can sleep with whoever I want to!
You were going to sleep with me?
You'll sleep with him over my dead body!
I'm having the best day ever!

If I were you, I'd pick Lewis. I mean, Oswald's my friend but I wouldn't want Lewis to be mad at me. Remember that time we saw "The Silence of the Lambs", and he said "Now, there's a guy that did something with his life"?
[Mimi's pregnant]
I felt something kick!
Hansel or Gretel?

[about Mimi]
Celia, this is makeup being tested on animals as we speak.
Wow, your team really sucks... Is that a guy with a hunchback?
That's a woman.
Give me a night and a bottle of wine, I'll straighten out that spine.
[At the Warsaw]
I can't believe Drew did this to me! I'm going to kill him!
[storms out]
Oh, no. We should probably warn Drew.
Yeah, we should do a lot of things.
[both continue drinking]
[George walks in on Drew and his 60 year old girlfriend]
Jesus Christ! When did Christmas turn into such a minefield?
My mom always said that if the Protestants catch a Catholic in their church, they feed them to the Jews.
[Nikki and Kate both married Drew at the same time]
And the award for the dumbest woman of all time goes to... Oh, my god. This almost never happens- IT'S A TIE!
Why didn't you just ask me for the money.
I can't ask you for money. I'm "The Rock".
"The Rock"?
Yeah. I'm the one that's always stable and reliable. I'm the one who loans money, gives advice and helps you guys out. "The Rock"...
You should be wearing a superhero outfit when you say that.
Don't mock "The Rock"!
I'm sorry, but we're going to have to close this bar down.
Well, I didn't want to resort to this, but...
[approaches female cop]
Hey, Baby. How'd you like to take a bath without ever having to step into a tub.
[sticks out his tongue]
I'm a lesbian, thank god.

[approaches female cop]
Please don't take away our bar.
Sorry. I never paid for it in my life.
They can't close the Warsaw. That's where I lost my Over-50-Guys virginity.
You mean your Guys-Over-50 virginity, right?
Uhh... Yeah.
I see you're still hanging out with your friends.
[looks at Lewis]
The tall freak.
[looks at Kate]
The skank.
[looks at Drew]
And, the bully magnet.
[Drew, Kate, Oswald and Lewis come to a black church]
Hi, Mr. Nichols. I brought some friends, I hope you don't mind.
No problem. Jesus even befriended the whores and the feeble minded.
[Oswald, Lewis and Kate stare at him]
Oh, I'm sorry. I didn't mean you people.
Oh, we're not offended. We're actually amazed at your insight.
You should come on Wednesday. It's Christian singles night. Lewis is always there, chatting up the young ladies.
Christian singles night, huh?
I suppose you would prefer some snobby, stuck-up woman you met at a bar. Well, so would I. But that didn't work, so welcome to plan B.
[Mimi bought the house next to the Warsaw]

[to Drew]
Whenever you drink a beer, I'll be here. Whenever you take a bite of a cheeseburger, I'll be here. Whenever you... what else do you do here?
[Mimi gets hit in the face with a pie]
Ha ha. A cream pie. Very funny.
Actually, that's a cold cream pie.

Wow, I cant believe you guys did such a nice thing for me. And yet you sit here, while this refrigerator is attracting flies in the middle of winter!
